ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.Data_Migration_Check__c.Bypass_Flow_Validations__c = FALSE && AND ( NOT( ISBLANK( Source_System_ID__c ) ) , NOT( ISBLANK( Service_Provided_by_Facility__c ) ) , TEXT(Service_Provided_by_Facility__r.Service_Type__c) <> Service_Type2__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Service Type does not match with selected Service Provided by Facility.
